import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, r''c:\\Users\\73506\\MABe-ConvTransformer''\)

import pandas as pd
from src.utils.kaggle_metric import mouse_fbeta

# Test: Check what happens with integer vs string agent_id
print\(''Test: Integer vs String agent_id''\)
solution = pd.DataFrame\([
    {''video_id'': 1, ''agent_id'': ''mouse1'', ''target_id'': ''mouse2'', ''action'': ''attack'', 
     ''start_frame'': 0, ''stop_frame'': 10, ''lab_id'': ''lab1'', 
     ''behaviors_labeled'': ''[""mouse1,mouse2,attack""]''},
]\)

# Submission with integer agent_id \(what might be happening\)
submission = pd.DataFrame\([
    {''video_id'': 1, ''agent_id'': 1, ''target_id'': 2, ''action'': ''attack'', 
     ''start_frame'': 0, ''stop_frame'': 10},
]\)

print\(f''Solution agent_id type: {type\(solution[""agent_id""].iloc[0]\)}''\)
print\(f''Submission agent_id type: {type\(submission[""agent_id""].iloc[0]\)}''\)

try:
    score = mouse_fbeta\(solution, submission\)
    print\(f''Score: {score}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)

# Check what behaviors_labeled expects
print\(''\\n--- Behaviors labeled check ---''\)
print\(''behaviors_labeled expects: mouse1,mouse2,attack''\)
print\(''If submission has integer agent_id \(1\), the check would be:''\)
print\(''  str\(1\) + "","" + str\(2\) + "","" + ""attack"" = ""1,2,attack""''\)
print\(''  This does NOT match ""mouse1,mouse2,attack""!''\)
")
